name: MU Online Game Data File
summary: Learn about .BMD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: BMD files can be viewed and sometimes modified with BMD editors, but alterations are not officially supported by WEBZEN. The files are commonly located within the Data\â€‹Local or Data directories of a MU Online installation.
WEBZEN, a Korean company, distributes Korean and English translations of MU Online.
